document_data.name: Matrons of the Sunless Depths
document_data.author: [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Matrons of the Sunless Depths''''' was a treatise by the [[drow]] [[priest]]ess [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]].
document_data.Description: Written in [[Elven language|Elvish]], the book discussed the importance of matriarchy in drow society. It was not considered a particularly valuable piece.
document_data.History: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a copy could be found in the guest quarters of Vlonwelv's base in the [[Muiral's Gauntlet]] section of [[Undermountain]].
